title: Fuzzy Friendship (with Christine Jardine, MP)
itunes:title: Fuzzy Friendship (with Christine Jardine, MP)
description:
Liberal Democrat MP Christine Jardine backs Tony Blair's calls for more cooperation between her party and Labour. But Jardine tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Sebastian Salek that it wouldn't be a "partnership" - so what would it be?

And as the EU signs off on its negotiating mandate for post-Brexit trade talks with the U.K., Hussein Kassim, professor of politics at the University of East Anglia and senior fellow at The U.K. in a Changing Europe answers the question on everyone's mind - who will budge first?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
